ai_description: Enchanted Prison Tattoo Kit. Allows an artist to create a tattoo of their choosing upon the skin of a willing or unwilling target, potentially imbue magical buffs and upgrades.
description: Allows someone to create a tattoo on a target, can potentially imbue magical buffs and upgrades if the artist is good enough.
name: Enchanted Prison Tattoo Kit
rules_text: Allows creation of tattoos that can have magical effects.
